DOC.brief_summary: A quasi-experitmental study efficacy intervention , include additional HIV care team daily inpatient round three telephone call remind upcoming clinic appointment , improve HIV care engagement within 30 day hospital discharge among HIV-infected patient .
DOC.brief_title: Interventions Improve HIV Care Engagement After Hospital Discharge
